attributes.action: Ask the country who should be the next Prime Minister
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Instead of handing over power of this country to a politician WHO HAS NOT BEEN ELECTED TO THAT POSITION, take the question to the general public of this country, the people who the Government are supposed to serve.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
